long_description: Light and comfortable, the stable Perception Tribute 12 kayak will have women kayakers rejoicing! Length and women-specific ergonomic design makes this an excellent boat for women who insist on straight-line tracking and solid performance; makes a great workout boat. High-density polyethylene construction offers performance, rugged durability and affordability. Weighing only 40 lbs., the Tribute is easy to lift and load onto a vehicle by yourself. Vertical wall flotation in bow adds buoyancy and works in conjunction with flotation bulkhead to manage loads of more than 200 lbs. Zone multi adjust outfitting system features a padded seat, adjustable backband, padded thighbraces and footbraces to personalize the fit. Watertight stern hatch with bulkhead wall, neoprene seal and hard hatch cover keeps gear dry and secure; dry storage space is perfect for a day's worth of gear. Perimeter deck lines enhance safety and ease entry into kayak. Ergonomic grab handles are easy on your hands during long portages.
short_description: Light and comfortable, the stable Perception Tribute 12 kayak will have women kayakers rejoicing!
